message.content:
1. A pooled analysis of 19 double-blind clinical studies was conducted by Merck.
2. The analysis included data available as of July 2009.
3. The data included information on 10,246 patients with type 2 diabetes (T2DM).
4. The analysis compared the tolerance of treatment with sitagliptin and control agents.
5. Treatment with sitagliptin was shown to be generally well tolerated compared with treatment with control agents.

messages.content:
Statement: In a previous pooled analysis of 19 double-blind clinical studies conducted by Merck, which included data available as of July 2009 on 10,246 patients with type 2 diabetes (T2DM), treatment with sitagliptin was shown to be generally well tolerated compared with treatment with control agents.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
